name: emailed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
email
A2 to send an email to someone: Email me when you've got time. [ + two objects ] Has he emailed you that list of addresses yet?
More examplesFewer examplesTo contact our Australian branch, email us at info@cambridge.edu.au.You can email cide@cambridge.org to find out more about this dictionary.I'll email my report to you as an attachment.I'll email him later today.She emailed me with the news.

Grammar
Saying email and internet addressesWhen we speak email and web addresses, we say each word separately. To avoid confusion, we sometimes spell out each letter of a word: …
